Package algo

Class Pcc

java.lang.Object
algo.Pcc
public class Pcc
extends java.lang.Object
This class computes and stores the shortest ways between pickUp and delivery points.
Author:
H4414

    • Pcc

      public Pcc​(modele.CityMap city, modele.Request request)
      Initialization with a City Map which contains the intersections and segments. The request contains the pickup and delivery Intersections.

      request -

  • Method Details

    • computePcc

      public algo.CompleteGraph computePcc()
      Computes lowest costs between pickup and delivery points. Stores the predecessors to be able to travel from a point to another. Returns a Complete graph to compute a optimized tour.
      Returns:

      finish -

      public java.util.List<modele.Way> computeWaysList​(java.util.List<modele.Intersection> interList)
      Return a list of ways from a list of intersections. The list of intersections come from a orderof visit computed by the TSP algo or from a user modification.

      interList -
      Returns:
